Summary: Triangular shaped UFO w/ a light in each corner and a blinking light (?).
trends: There have been 41 other sightings in Spokane
There was one other sighting in Spokane on or around March 6th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsGot out of the car in my parking lot and was walking to my apt. Looked up to see the beautiful night sky which filled with high, puffy clouds that were reflecting the moon and I could see a few stars here and there. My eyes quickly fell upon what seemed to be a classic ���spycraft��� triangle UFO. I quickly discerned it wasn���t a plane, although at first I thought it was because it had flashing lights like one. One light was white, the other red, and the other blue if I remember right. It also may have had a blinking light in the middle. I haven���t a clue how high up it was but it seemed a bit higher than the clouds and seemed not much bigger than my index finger from a distance, and it was moving about as fast as a plane. No engine sounds although that didn���t surprise me at all considering the height it appeared to be at. I thought "Cool! I'm seeing a UFO! Wonder just what it is and where it came from!", but I did not (and don't) consider it a big deal, and consider it a mostly fleeting, not-too-spectacular experience. My assumption it was one of those spyplane things. Why it had flashing, blaring lights though when it���s supposed to be spying is beyond me! But that���s what I think it may have been as we have an Air Force base nearby. But of course there's no way to know for sure.
